price: Dan bersabarlah kamu, sesungguhnya janji Allah adalah benar dan sekali-kali janganlah orang-orang yang tidak meyakini (kebenaran ayat-ayat Allah) itu menggelisahkan kamu.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walā yastakhiffannaka alladhīna lā yūqinūna
